text: Are Discord channels searchable/visible to outside? Humans of Julia have three ask-for-help channels.

elements.text: Are Discord channels searchable/visible to outside? Humans of Julia have three ask-for-help channels.

text: YeaH that’s because there’s no thread support with Discord. Not searchable outside but we just thought about doing something similar to the bot here with #helpdesk channel.
